snippet: Thomas Vanek was traded to the Montreal Canadiens, his third team this season, in exchange for a conditional second-round draft pick and the prospect Sebastian Collberg.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders trade high-scoring left wing Thomas Vanek to the Montreal Canadiens in return for a conditional second-round draft pick and the prospect Sebastian Collberg; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Vanek was traded to the Montreal Canadiens, his third team this season, in exchange for a conditional second-round draft pick and the prospect Sebastian Collberg.

headline.main: Islanders Deal Vanek at N.H.L. Trade Deadline, but Devils Keep Brodeur
headline.print_headline: Islanders Trade Vanek; Brodeur Stays With the Devils
